goal.en: A broad introduction of data structures and algorithms for beginners
goal.ch: 講授資料結構與演算法的基本原理與程式設計策略 (密碼卡請email 授課教師詢問，adamhuan@gmail.com)

content.en: Week 1 Introduction；Week 2 Data structures: Array, list, stack, queue, tree, heap；Week 3 Programming issues: Algorithmic thinking, complexity；Week 4 Algorithms: Sorting, insertion sort, merge sort ；Week 5 Data structures: heap；Week 6 Data structures: binary search tree；Week 7 Data structures: AVL tree, decision tree (lower bound)；Week 8 Midterm review；Week 9 Midterm exam；Week 10 Algorithms: Clustering, k-means；Week 11 Algorithms: NP-completeness；Week 12 Data structures: dictionary, hashing table；Week 13 Algorithms: Greedy algorithms；Week 14 Algorithms: Divide and conquer；Week 15 Algorithms: Approximation algorithms；Week 16 Algorithms: Selected machine learning examples；Week 17 Final review；Week 18 Final exam
content.ch: 第01週 演算法的課程介紹；第02週 資料結構：array, list, stack, queue, tree, heap；第03週 程式設計：algorithmic thinking, computational complexity；第04週 演算法：sorting, insertion sort, merge sort；第05週 資料結構：heap；第06週 資料結構：binary search tree；第07週 資料結構：AVL tree, decision tree (lower bound)；第08週 期中考課程複習；第09週 期中考；第10週 演算法：clustering, k-means；第11週 演算法：NP-completeness；第12週 資料結構：dictionary, hashing table；第13週 演算法：greedy algorithms；第14週 演算法：divide and conquer；第15週 演算法：approximation algorithms；第16週 演算法專題：selected machine learning examples；第17週 期末考課程複習；第18週 期末考

textbook.en: "(Textbook) Algorithms by Jeff Erickson(Reference) Introduction to Algorithms by Thomas H. Cormen, Charles E. Leiserson, Ronald L. Rivest, and Clifford Stein"
textbook.ch: "(教科書) Algorithms by Jeff Erickson(參考書) Introduction to Algorithms by Thomas H. Cormen, Charles E. Leiserson, Ronald L. Rivest, and Clifford Stein"

en.competency: Learn the basics of mathematics, physics, chemistry, medicine, biology and their applications in healthcare
Ability to perform experimental design, data analysis and inference
Familiar with clinical medicine, and cultivate the ability of design, development, and field applications of biomedical devices or materials
Familiar with the principles of sensing elements, learn the ability to design, manufacture and integrate intelligent systems
The ability to discover, explore, analyze, process and reconstruct problems
Cultivate the ability of integrating multi-level cross-domain teamwork
Understand the reconciliation between professional knowledge and humanistic ethics, as well as the impact of technology on the environment and society, and the ability to continuous learning

ch.competency: 學習數物化、醫學、生物等科學基礎與精進知識、思辨邏輯及運用能力
執行實驗設計、數據分析與推論的能力
熟悉臨床醫學，並培養生醫器材或材料之設計、開發、及場域應用的能力
熟悉感測元件原理、訓練製造、設計與整合智慧系統
發掘、探究、解析、處理以及重構問題
培養多層面跨域整合與團隊合作
ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 作業練習 ， 實作/實驗 ， 出席/課堂表現

ch.competency: 瞭解專業知識與人本倫理間的調和、以及技術對環境、社會之影響，並能持續學習
ch.Assessments: 作業練習 ， 出席/課堂表現
